text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) pranshuparmar/witr | 95% | stars now 8729 → est 15353 (range 15296-15410)
   https://github.com/pranshuparmar/witr
2) AnmolSaini16/mapcn | 93% | stars now 1743 → est 5128 (range 5103-5153)
   https://github.com/AnmolSaini16/mapcn
3) HKUDS/DeepTutor | 93% | stars now 1385 → est 4183 (range 4158-4208)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/DeepTutor
4) Tencent-Hunyuan/HY-Motion-1.0 | 92% | stars now 1165 → est 4003 (range 3978-4028)
   https://github.com/Tencent-Hunyuan/HY-Motion-1.0
5) nguyenphutrong/quotio | 91% | stars now 1678 → est 3490 (range 3465-3515)
   https://github.com/nguyenphutrong/quotio

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
